mapper.update:
update video
video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
views = #{views,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

share_count = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update video set video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, views = #{views,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "status" = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, enjoy_count = #{enjoyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_count = #{shareCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
